message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $120. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at that price?
